# üìú CV

üìú `CV` is an [awesome bash cli](https://github.com/kamangir/awesome-bash-cli) plugin for [my](https://abadpour.com/) CV, in two versions: [compact](https://abadpour-com.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/cv/arash-abadpour-resume.pdf) and [full](https://abadpour-com.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/cv/arash-abadpour-resume-full.pdf).

```bash
pip install abadpour
```

```bash
 > CV help
CV build [dryrun,~publish,~rm,what=<cv+cv-full>]
 . build CV.
CV clean
 . clean CV.
```

---

[![PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/abadpour.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/abadpour/)

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è a push to this repo triggers a `CV build [publish]`.
